def Load(widget): ordemCompra = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity if ordemCompra == None: return
if ordemCompra.BuscarStatus() == 5: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False elif ordemCompra.BuscarStatus() == 3: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False elif ordemCompra.BuscarStatus() == 4: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
